forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 21C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 71F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 66F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 19C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 67F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. Areas of fog developing after midnight. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 63F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 63F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low around 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
